text: Bad Girls Club: Social Disruption is the sixteenth season of the Oxygen reality television series Bad Girls Club. == Cast == === Original Bad Girls === Name Age Hometown Social Media Adryan Jones 23 Philadelphia, Pennsylvania @RidiculouslyRyan Brynesha Seegers 22 Washington, D.C. @TaloneMusic Elliadria Griffin 25 Dallas, Texas @iampersuasian Kaila Wilkey 22 Richmond, California @wiintrr Kailie Grossguth 21 Allenstown, New Hampshire @KailieBijou Tabatha “DreamDoll” Robinson 23 Edenwald, NY @DreamDoll_ Stephanie Carrino 24 San Jose, California @lady.westcoast === Replacement Bad Girls === Name Age Hometown Social Media Replaced Stephanie Tejada 27 Orlando, Florida @StephanieTejadaa Tabatha Kandyce Hogan 24 Riverdale, Illinois @kandyce_hogan Elliadria Kabrina Nashaye 23 Chicago, Illinois @BossyBrina Kailie Tiara Nicole 26 Memphis, Tennessee @mytiaranicole Kaila
